title: JT Wins Big
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss Thomas’s win and Pereira’s collapse at the PGA Championship, Josh Donaldson’s “Jackie” comment and Juwan Howard turning down the Laker’s interest. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
